description.value:
You touch a creature that has died within the last minute, diamonds in hand. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point, remaining @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}.

This spell fails if the creature has died of old age, and it does not restore any missing body parts.

materials.value: Diamonds worth 300gp, which the spell consumes.
